title: Wheels Continue to Come Off Visma-Lease a Bike: Cian Uijtdebroeks Exits Giro d’Italia
content:
A year after sweeping all three grand tours, the 'Killer Bees' are reeling from injuries and illnesses, and it remains uncertain if Wout Van Aert or Jonas Vingegaard will race the Tour de France.

Read the full article at Wheels Continue to Come Off Visma-Lease a Bike: Cian Uijtdebroeks Exits Giro d’Italia on Velo.
author: ahood
